> -----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Johannes O. Akinlaja [mailto:joa@...]
> Gesendet: Dienstag, 19. Juni 2001 14:45
> An: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Betreff: [junit] Does this have a bad smell
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I am a regular reader of Eric Allen's series at IBM
> devoloperWorks.
> In his newest article
> (http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-diag0612
> .html) he
> intermingles test code with production code. In my opinion,
> this has a bad
> smell, but ... well, I am interested of your opinion as I am
> not to sure if
> I am right.
>
> Toyin
